headline: Assessing Realty Income (NYSE:O) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum Reignites Investor Interest
summary: Realty Income (O) is back on investors’ radar after recent share price moves, with the stock closing at $65.66. That has many income focused investors rechecking the REIT’s fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Realty Income. The recent move to $65.66 comes on top of a 6.9% 1 month share price return and a 14.6% year to date share price return. The 1 year total shareholder return of 25.7% points to momentum that has been building rather than fading. If this has you rethinking where income...

headline: How Investors May Respond To Realty Income (O) Partnering With GIC To Target U.S. Logistics Assets
summary: In recent months, Realty Income, “The Monthly Dividend Company,” expanded its portfolio through large-scale logistics and gaming investments, while forming a more than US$1.70 billion real estate partnership with Singapore’s sovereign wealth fund GIC to pursue U.S. logistics assets and other income-producing properties. These moves, combined with over 55 years of monthly dividends and three decades of annual payout increases, underline how Realty Income is using new capital partnerships to...
